Name: World of Mines Creator's Edition
About the game: World of Mines Creator's Edition is getting evolved with the Workshop !! It allows you not only to just create your own map but also to be an Artist of the PIXEL ART !! Try to create the masterpiece in the World of Mine Workshop!!! From Ver . 1.3.0, you can enjoy the ' PIXEL ART ' that enables you to color your map during the Map Creation! This would give you more colorful and richer experience in Steam Workshop . Furthermore, the other players would have fun and enjoy your map with more curiosity! Be the Pixel Art pro and make your mark in the World of Mines! Ever dream of saving the world? World of Mines is your chance to get rid of the world of deadly killer mines, one country at a time, 178 countries in total. Which countries will you save first and who will you leave ‘til the end? The World of Mines offers a user-generated map mode to indefinitely have new maps to resolve. Every level is different, and the unique map shapes deliver a different style of fun. Save the world by marking the locations of mines Easy to control Best, smoothest, fastest interface of any mines game First clearance never explodes Question Mark Mode: Turn on question mark mode to quickly mark suspect tiles 178 countries available in variable map sizes and shapes for hours of fun Best of all, create and tune your own maps for the players in the community for more fun! Import your own drawings or pics to pixelate them into custom maps and upload via Steam Workshop for others to enjoy. Moreover, set the difficulty with either Difficulty Level or Mine Numbers to make your map more challenging. We are looking forward to your opinions on how to improve World of Mines ! Ever dream of saving the world? World of Mines is your chance to get rid of the world of deadly killer mines, one country at a time, 178 countries in total. Which countries will you save first and who will you leave ‘til the end? The World of Mines offers a user-generated map mode to indefinitely have new maps to resolve. HOW TO PLAY The objective of the game is to clear each country map of hidden “mines” or bombs without detonation, albeit with help from clues stating the number of neighboring mines for each tile. The player is initially presented with a world map, from which a country is chosen and played one at a time. The game is played by marking all tiles under which a mine is hidden with a flag and freeing up all tiles that do not have a mine underneath. If a tile containing a mine is revealed instead of being marked with a flag, the player loses the game. The digit displayed in tiles indicate the number of mines adjacent. / /
